headline: Broadcom's all-time high, CVS investment, Robinhood & Bitstamp
summary: Yahoo Finance host Brad Smith tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including Broadcom (AVGO) shares hitting an all-time high ahead of its earnings this Thursday, CVS Health (CVS) revealed plans to invest $20 billion to modernize American healthcare, and Robinhood Markets (HOOD) completing its acquisition of European crypto exchange Bitstamp. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Hyperfine Stock Rises After FDA Clears Next-Gen Swoop MRI System
summary: HYPR secures FDA clearance for its next-gen Swoop system, advancing bedside MRI tech and reinforcing its mission to revolutionize accessible neuroimaging.

headline: Exclusive: CVS lays out $20B plan to modernize US consumer healthcare experience
summary: CVS is investing $20 billion in 10 years to help upgrade the consumer healthcare experience in what it hopes will be a revolutionary change for all Americans

headline: Top 4 Value Stocks to Buy as Trade Tensions Still Cloud H2 Outlook
summary: STNE, CNC, CVS and PFE stand out as top value picks amid trade tensions and a murky H2 economic outlook.
